mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(title, content, author_id, is_active, start_at, end_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{authorId}, #{isActive}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE is_active = 1 AND (start_at IS NULL OR start_at <= NOW()) AND (end_at IS NULL OR end_at >= NOW()) ORDER BY created_at DESC
